inclusion.criterion: Rome IV criteria for IBS diagnosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Investigation to exclude other gastrointestinal organic cause(s)
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of antibiotics or probiotics within 1 month prior to FMT
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has atypical hemolytic uremic syndrome, which may be a comorbidity. He is not pregnant or lactating and does not have a history of antibiotic use within the past month.
